servers.description: The endpoint for PlayFab title-scoped APIs.

post.description: Retrieves detailed information about segments, including their associated definitions and actions. For more details, refer to the official documentation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/playfab/admin/segments/get-segments?view=playfab-rest

requestBody.description: Request body to retrieve segment information. The body should contain an array `SegmentIds`, that defaults to an empty array to return information for all segments. Specifying values in `SegmentIds` will return information for only those segments.

200.description: Response containing the details of the segments, or an error message if applicable.

400.description: Error response containing an error message for the request.

post.description: Create a new segment by defining conditions on player properties and actions to target the segments for a title. For more details, refer to the official documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/playfab/admin/segments/createsegment.

requestBody.description: Request body to create a segment. The body should contain an object `SegmentModel`.

200.description: Response containing the id of the created segment, or an error message if applicable.

code.description: The numerical HTTP status code indicating the failure.

status.description: The string HTTP status code indicating the failure.

error.description: The PlayFab error code associated with the failure.

errorCode.description: The numerical PlayFab error code corresponding to the error.

errorMessage.description: A descriptive message providing more information about the error.

errorDetails.description: Additional details describing individual issues with the request object.

ApiErrorWrapper.description: A standardized wrapper around every failed API response containing the error details.
